name: Mojo Video Poker HD
description:
Mojo Video Poker is a fast, realistic, video poker experience. Features four completely different game types:

• Classic Video Poker
• Triple Hand Video Poker
• Super Multiplier Poker
• Chase the Multiplier * (Paid version only)

Each game supports Jacks or Better, additional game types are available for purchase.

Mojo Video Poker HD has high resolution graphics, featuring selectable card styles, and newly rendered marquees.

Mojo Video Poker is the most complete Video Poker collection that runs on iPad, and it is continuing to grow with new games and features in future updates.

Additional game modes can be purchased within the app.

• Bonus Poker
• Aces and Faces
• Double Bonus Poker
• Deuces Wild
• Bonus Deuces Wild
